reviews.snippet:
A very cute and small restaurant close to the Akihabara Station. Our waiter was very friendly, explained the restaurant and its history. I had the Cheeseburger, it was a delicious and very juicy burger with great sauce on it. The wedges on the site were crispy and potatoy in the insinde and perfectly salted.

Overall a great experience.

extracted_snippet.original:
A very cute and small restaurant close to the Akihabara Station. Our waiter was very friendly, explained the restaurant and its history. I had the Cheeseburger, it was a delicious and very juicy burger with great sauce on it. The wedges on the site were crispy and potatoy in the insinde and perfectly salted.

Overall a great experience.
